behemoth.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a trade behemoth that shipped abroad $800 billion worth of goods
behemoth.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an extremely large, mythical creature mentioned in the Bible, whose name is now used to describe something very big
behemoth.translation[2].definitions[0].d: a very large and powerful international company, business, industry etc
behemoth.translation[2].definitions[0].e: a company that grew into a behemoth in New Zealand and today controls billions of dollars in assets worldwide
